Articles.Content:
Operating System: OSX 10.7.5 (More detailed system specifications here: http://www./view/4atajv0x6lwe74l/Mac_Specifications.rtf)

KSP Version: 0.25 (Unmodded) (Non-Steam Version)

What's Happening: Whenever I click the update button it opens terminal, but nothing happens. I know that I can launch KSP separately, but that's not what I'm trying to do. I'm trying to update the game to 0.90 via the launcher because I don't want to have to download the new KSP version from the website and transfer everything over.
Patcher itself does not currently work on Macs, so the only option is to download from the KSP Store.
